header.title: We craft digital tools from human stories
header.description: Almost half of America struggles to balance their finances against their basic needs, and while there are resources to help, very few even know they exist. We worked directly with the communities we hope to serve to create digital solutions around common money problems. And we’re giving them away for free.

contact.title: Curious? Let's help you utilize Steps
contact.description: We have been actively working with various organizations that could benefit from the tools we’ve created. If you feel like you could partner with us, reach out and let’s start the conversation.
